name: Ivan Milincic
headline: Hi Im Ivan Milincic, a Web Developer with over 10 years of experience, currently working as a Freelancer.
bio: I'm Serbian living and working from Sofia, Bulgaria. I have a strong passion for web development and technology in general. Over the years, I have explored various aspects of the tech industry, but I have discovered my true calling in web development, which is a field I genuinely love and enjoy.

stack.title: CSS
stack.subtitle: I am highly proficient in CSS and effective use of CSS frameworks.

stack.title: JavaScript
stack.subtitle: Vanilla JavaScript, Ajax, libraries like HTMX and alpine.js and consuming APIs

stack.title: ProcessWire
stack.subtitle: My main platform for building custom websites and web apps

stack.title: WordPress
stack.subtitle: Can't avoid the WordPress ecosystem, so I utilize it based on client requests.

stack.title: WooCommerce
stack.subtitle: My go-to e-commerce platform for building robust and customized e-commerce websites.

stack.title: Static Site Generators
stack.subtitle: SSG with 11ty, Nuxt.js and Astro. For documentation sites, I often utilize VitePress.

stack.title: UIkit
stack.subtitle: My favorite CSS framework. It resonate with my development style and allow me to create web interfaces efficiently.

stack.title: Vue
stack.subtitle: I have experimented with Vue.js and have been exploring Nuxt.js. I am eager to deepen my understanding and further.

stack.title: Beyond Coding
stack.subtitle: My experience on the web goes beyond writing the code. Hosting, DNS, GIT, Design & Graphics and more...
